Rachel Maddow's Documentary 'From Russia With Lev' to Premiere on September 7

A new documentary, "From Russia With Lev," executive produced by Rachel Maddow, is set to premiere on September 7 at the Brooklyn Academy of Music (BAM). The film tells the story of Lev Parnas, a Ukrainian-born hustler who became embroiled in a scheme with Donald Trump and his attorney Rudolph Giuliani to dig up false allegations against Joe Biden.

The documentary follows Parnas' journey from his association with Trump to his eventual imprisonment. It reveals the inner workings of the campaign to damage Biden's reputation and secure Trump's re-election.

The world premiere of "From Russia With Lev" will take place on September 7 at BAM, with two screenings scheduled for 5 pm and 7 pm. Rachel Maddow will introduce the 5 pm screening, while the 7 pm screening will feature a post-panel discussion with Director Billy Corben and Producer Alfred Spellman.

Tickets are now available for purchase for the world premiere of "From Russia With Lev." Don't miss this opportunity to see the documentary that sheds light on one of the most outrageous schemes in recent political history.

https://www.msnbc.com/lev
